name: Squared (Marty Starkiller (Twin Pines Soft))
description:
Squared is a game inspired by classic puzzle games. Mix, twist, and match 6 different types of blocks and be the best player in the world! Can you beat the challenge?

This game was made in exactly 3 Days, 0 Hours 28, Minutes, and 50 Seconds for the Finally Finishing Something Jam 2021
